      • dailyUpdateAccountBalance

        public void dailyUpdateAccountBalance()
                               throws NotEnoughBalanceException,
                                      java.io.IOException
        Update account interest method. withdraw from client account in case negative balance, deposit into client account in case positive balnace, called by daily process.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughBalanceException - not relevant in account class.
        java.io.IOException - in case I/O log file failure.
